generated_text:
"Module 46: AI Basics" (10-minute video)

For advanced learners, this module provides an in-depth introduction to Artificial Intelligence fundamentals. Key topics include:

* Machine learning types (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement)
* Neural network basics
* AI applications and limitations

Through interactive visuals and real-world examples, learners will gain a deeper understanding of AI concepts and their practical applications. By the end of this module, learners will be able to explain AI basics and identify potential use cases.

mcqs.question: What type of machine learning involves a teacher or labeled data?
What is the primary function of a neural network?

flashcards.back: A type of machine learning where the algorithm is trained on labeled data
A computer system modeled after the human brain, used for tasks such as image recognition and natural language processing
